name: Stomp Party - Early Access
description:
Current Version: V1.0.2!

Stomp Party is a fast-paced and action-packed platform fighter that is perfect for players of all skill levels. In this game, you can only use three types of moves: the Down Air (also known as the Stomp), the Special, and the Super Stomp (which functions like a final smash). These moves are all you need to take down your opponents and emerge victorious.

The game features a roster of unique and memorable characters, including indie media favorites like Ortheo from Ortheo, Pico from Pico's School, cat from 52Beatup, Welltaro from Downwell, Viridian from VVVVVV, and more. There are also original characters like Axe and Jake for you to choose from.

Whether you're a seasoned platform fighter veteran or a newcomer to the genre, Stomp Party is sure to provide endless hours of entertainment and intense competition. So gather your friends and get ready to stomp your way to victory!
